rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming area with natural light. The design adheres to Vastu principles by positioning the entrance in the south-west corner for prosperity and energy flow.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area with floor-to-ceiling windows to maximize natural light. The room is designed to encourage family interactions while maintaining Scandinavian simplicity and functional layout.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room, designed with subtle separations and ample seating area. The design aligns with budget constraints by using multipurpose fixtures.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A functional kitchen space designed for efficiency. Incorporates energy-efficient appliances and storage solutions aligned with Scandinavian aesthetics.

rooms.name: Garage
rooms.description: Dual car garage with ample space for two vehicles. Incorporates sliding doors to save cost and improve space utilization.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: A dedicated library area with built-in shelves. Positioned to take advantage of natural light from floor-to-ceiling windows, ensuring a serene reading environment.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: A well-defined entrance door located at the south-west corner, promoting positive energy flow according to Vastu.

openings.name: Frontal Windows
openings.description: Multiple floor-to-ceiling windows integrated into the living room and library for natural lighting.

openings.name: Garage Door
openings.description: Automated sliding door designed to facilitate easy access while saving costs on construction.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A spacious master bedroom featuring floor-to-ceiling windows for abundant natural light. The placement ensures privacy and aligns with Vastu by orienting the bed towards the northeast.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A comfortable guest room designed with Scandinavian minimalism. It includes ample storage and is positioned to maintain balance within the floor plan.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A full bathroom located adjacent to both bedrooms for convenient use. Designed with cost-effective fixtures and finishes.

openings.name: Balcony Access
openings.description: A small balcony off the master bedroom providing a private outdoor space and improved ventilation.
